lead_paragraph: NFL fields have come a long way from the days of lumpy artificial surfaces, but there's still a lot of room for improvement, the head of the players' union said Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: NFLPA Head Says Fields Much Better, Still Can Be Improved
headline.main: NFLPA Head Says Fields Much Better, Still Can Be Improved
